text: @CBSNews @MichaelRapaport 👎🏼 when you used go to a baseball game there were no fat orange ogres wearing a girdle on stage and covid19 was not around. But whatever if they want to go to an all you can get coronavirus buffet to each his own. Just don’t church it up like it’s a walk in the park, a 2018 park.
